", "url": "", "description": "There is an additional emergency pantry (for urgent need such as fire, utility shut-off, homelessness; non-perishable items only) available Monday, Tuesday, and Thursday from 9:00 a.m. \u2013 2:00 p.m., and Wednesday from 2:00 \u2013 4:00 p.m.", "services": ["Food Pantry"], "full_address": "393 River Street", "source": "food_bank_of_western_massachusetts_ma", "food_bank": "Food Bank of Western Massachusetts"}
